TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Having to do with two structures of the brain, the cerebellum (located at the lower back of the brain) and the pons (located at the base of the brain in front of the cerebellum) and the area between them.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Relacionado con dos estructuras del cerebro, el cerebelo (ubicado en la región inferior posterior del cerebro) y el puente (ubicado en la base del cerebro delante del cerebelo) y el área entre ellos.
